sections.abstract: Creatine supplementation is widely used among athletes and recreational lifters. This study followed users for up to five years and monitored clinical markers of safety...
sections.introduction: Creatine monohydrate has become a popular ergogenic aid due to its effects on strength and lean body mass. However, some concerns remain about potential long-term adverse effects...
sections.results: Across 5 years of monitored use, no serious adverse events were reported. Kidney and liver function remained within clinical reference ranges in the creatine group...
sections.conclusion: These findings support the safety of long-term creatine use in healthy adults when taken at customary doses...
